title: Fantastic stay!!! Lovely Staff!!!
text:
Myself and my wife stayed for 9 nights in this establishment and it was well worth it. From check in to check out, everything was so swift and staff from Reception to Breakfast room to Housekeeping were all brilliant. They were all very helpful anytime and catered all our needs. We just couldn't thank them enough for looking after us so well.
For breakfast, you could make your own vegetable or fruit juice. Also you can make your own pancakes by just pressing the OK button and in 60 secs your pancake is ready. I had them every morning with honey. They had plenty of meat options too but we hardly had to touch them because there were so many other healthy options.
Thank you once again and we will have no hesitation in recommending Hotel Delle Province to anybody.
With Regards and lots of love,
Roshan & Sarita
